content: Basically, I completed the finger exercise as soon as it was assigned and submitted it and got a 100%. Then I went and checked today (the day after it was due) and it looks like I got a 0 on it. I don't know what to do as I remember completing it and the code that I used to go about doing it so i don't know why it says that I didn't.
subject: I completed Finger Exercise 3 but it says I didn't

content: I don't see any submissions from you, and it looks like you hit "show answer" for those exercises so we can't allow a late submission. I'll make a note of your situation and take it into account when we do final grades.
